com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Interface ScupLabel.TapListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ScupLabel

    public static interface ScupLabel.TapListener
    This listener interface is called when user taps on the screen.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSingleTap(ScupLabel label, float x, float y)
      This function is called when user taps on the screen

    • Method Detail

      • onSingleTap

        void onSingleTap(ScupLabel label,
               float x,
               float y)
        This function is called when user taps on the screen
        Parameters:
        label - The instance of the label from which label is taped.
        x - The touch value. This value is percentage(touch x-coordinate / dialog width)
        y - The touch value. This value is percentage(touch y-coordinate / dialog height)
